overview: Jean Barrote is one of the three partners that comprise Ulive.fm. Ulive.fm is a social music network. Jean has joined the Ulive.fm team in February 2009 and has since then gained more responsibility and now occupies the position of Chief Business Development Officer. Jean has a bachelors degree in urban planning from UniversitÃ© de MontrÃ©al. After searching around a bit in the domain he finally came around to his real passion: business. He is currently applying for a post-BAC diploma in management at HEC and plans eventually to follow an MBa.
